title: The Book Club: Robert Douglas-Fairhurst
description: This week, Sam is joined by Robert Douglas-Fairhurst - whose latest book is The Turning Point: A Year That Changed Dickens and the World. On the podcast he speaks about how 1851 - the year of the Great Exhibition - served as a pivot in Dickensâ€™s own life, and set him on the path to writing Bleak House.
